node.name: Visual Rules Enterprise Platform 4.5: Available now
node.shortdescription:
Visual Rules is an especially intuitive and high-performance Business Rules Management System for creating and managing business rules. Business logic is modeled, tested, monitored and managed in a simple but powerful graphical interface. Visual Rules covers the complete rule management process. Via a uniquely comprehensive graphical modeling approach, Visual Rules provides an advanced collaboration platform for business analysts and IT.


Visual Rules is designed for integration of rule management into applications and Eclipse-based platforms.




Top Reasons For Choosing Visual Rules

- Model business logic graphically - no need to learn a script

- Create business rules via drag & drop of descriptive icons

- Test-driven and iterative approach

- Profiling function for business rules included

- Automatic documentation of rule projects

- Integrated process support

- Powerful collaboration platform for business & IT

- Maximum performance and scaleability

- Hot deployment while executing

- A diversity of extension points for integration into applications and platforms



Visual Rules 4.4.1: What's new?



Visual Rules Modeler 4.5

* New versioning and definition of dependencies between rule projects

* Dynamic dependency resolution between projects and/or artifacts from an artifact repository (e.g. Apache Archiva)

* Support for Maven project layouts

* Reuse of rule models inside of JARs (rule artifacts)

* New test suite editor for definition and execution of multiple tests

* Import of decision tables from Excel

* Copy&paste of data into and out of test editor

* Service mocking during test execution

* Rule model and test refactoring when deleting elements (particularly input/output data, attributes etc.)

* Manual overrides within the "Automatic Element Creation" dialog

* Recategorized built-in functions



Visual Rules QA & Deployment Tools 4.5

* Full Maven support, including storage of rule artifacts in Maven artifact repositories

* Maven plugins for model validation, creation of rule code, WSDL and rule artifacts, and deployment

* Support for rule artifacts (JARs with rule code and rule models) for dependency resolution, for deployment, but also for modeling in Visual Rules Modeler (see above)

* New Ant task for Execution Server deployments



Visual Rules Execution Server 4.5

* Dynamic routing of requests to rule models (based on metadata)

* Support for external databases

* Creation and retrieval of execution statistics for traceability




Visual Rules Team Server 4.5

* Support for external databases

* Improved performance

The license is free for a 30 day evaluation phase and for non-commercial, research based organizations (Universities, not-for-profit corporations).
